headline: Howard Ungerleider to Join Air Products' Board of Directors
summary: Air Products' (NYSE: APD) Board of Directors has elected Howard Ungerleider as a director of the Company, effective September 1, 2025. He will serve as a member of the Audit and Finance Committee.
